# Inn, Dockside
## Overview
**Inn, Dockside:** Much like the inn described above, except that this one swaps out one of its stables for a small dock to service its boating customers.

*Components: [[Tavern, Basic|Basic tavern]]*, [[Stable, Basic|basic stable]], [[Dock, Basic|basic dock]], [[Bedrooms, Basic|basic bedrooms]] (10), [[Kitchen, Fancy|fancy kitchen]], [[Servants' Quarters|servantsâ€™ quarters]], [[Storage, Basic|basic storage]]; *Size:* 16 stronghold spaces; *Cost:* 12,550 gp.

*Staff:* Cooks (2), groom, laborers (2), servants (2); *Upkeep:* 22.5 gp per month.
